verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> about אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and בָּנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> and to his sons וְיִנָּֽזְרוּ֙ <S%H5144><s%> that they separate מִקָּדְשֵׁ֣י <S%H6944><s%> themselves from the holy things בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יְחַלְּל֖וּ <S%H2490><s%> and that they profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> not my holy אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which הֵ֧ם <S%H1992><s%> they מַקְדִּשִׁ֛ים <S%H6942><s%> [in those things] which they hallow לִ֖י אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto me I [am] the LORD

אֱמֹ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Say אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> throughout לְדֹרֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1755><s%> among your generations כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any אִ֣ישׁ ׀ <S%H376><s%> unto them Whosoever אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִקְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> that goeth מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זַרְעֲכֶ֗ם <S%H2233><s%> [he be] of all your seed אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <S%H6944><s%> unto the holy things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יַקְדִּ֤ישׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> hallow בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְטֻמְאָת֖וֹ <S%H2932><s%> having his uncleanness עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְנִכְרְתָ֞ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֧פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> upon him that soul הַהִ֛וא <S%H1931><s%> he מִלְּפָנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from my presence אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> What man soever אִ֞ישׁ <S%H376><s%> or a man מִזֶּ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> of the seed אַהֲרֹ֗ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> who צָר֙וּעַ֙ <S%H6879><s%> [is] a leper א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or זָ֔ב <S%H2100><s%> or hath a running issue בַּקֳּדָשִׁים֙ <S%H6944><s%> of the holy things לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֹאכַ֔ל <S%H398><s%> he shall not eat עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> he יִטְהָ֑ר <S%H2891><s%> until he be clean וְהַנֹּגֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H5060><s%> And whoso toucheth בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> anything טְמֵא־ <S%H2931><s%> any thing [that is] unclean נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [by] the dead א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after תֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> goeth מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at שִׁכְבַת־ <S%H7902><s%> emission זָֽרַע׃ <S%H2233><s%> of the descendants

אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> Or whosoever אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִגַּ֔ע <S%H5060><s%> toucheth בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any שֶׁ֖רֶץ <S%H8318><s%> any creeping thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יִטְמָא־ <S%H2930><s%> whereby he may be made unclean ל֑וֹ א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> or a man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom יִטְמָא־ <S%H2930><s%> of whom he may take uncleanness ל֔וֹ לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> whatever טֻמְאָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2932><s%> whatsoever uncleanness

נֶ֚פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> The soul אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who תִּגַּע־ <S%H5060><s%> which hath touched בּ֔וֹ וְטָמְאָ֖ה <S%H2930><s%> any such shall be unclean עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until even וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> and shall not יֹאכַל֙ <S%H398><s%> and shall not eat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַקֳּדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6944><s%> of the holy things כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> unless רָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> he wash בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> with water

וּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> is down הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> And when the sun וְטָהֵ֑ר <S%H2891><s%> he shall be clean וְאַחַר֙ <S%H310><s%> and shall afterward יֹאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> eat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַקֳּדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6944><s%> of the holy things כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לַחְמ֖וֹ <S%H3899><s%> because it [is] his food הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

נְבֵלָ֧ה <S%H5038><s%> That which dieth of itself וּטְרֵפָ֛ה <S%H2966><s%> or is torn לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יֹאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> [with beasts] he shall not eat לְטָמְאָה־ <S%H2930><s%> to defile בָ֑הּ אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> himself therewith I [am] the LORD

וְשָׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> They shall therefore keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֗י <S%H4931><s%> mine ordinance וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> lest they bear עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> because חֵ֔טְא <S%H2399><s%> sin וּמֵ֥תוּ <S%H4191><s%> for it and die ב֖וֹ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because יְחַלְּלֻ֑הוּ <S%H2490><s%> therefore if they profane אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> it I the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <S%H6942><s%> do sanctify

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner זָ֖ר <S%H2114><s%> There shall no stranger לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יֹ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> eat קֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [of] the holy thing תּוֹשַׁ֥ב <S%H8453><s%> a sojourner כֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> of the priest וְשָׂכִ֖יר <S%H7916><s%> or an hired servant לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יֹ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> shall not eat קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> [of] the holy thing

וְכֹהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> But if the priest כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יִקְנֶ֥ה <S%H7069><s%> buy נֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <S%H5315><s%> [any] soul קִנְיַ֣ן <S%H7075><s%> with כַּסְפּ֔וֹ <S%H3701><s%> his money ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> one יֹ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> he shall eat בּ֑וֹ וִילִ֣יד <S%H3211><s%> of it and he that is born בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> and those יֹאכְל֥וּ <S%H398><s%> they shall eat בְלַחְמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3899><s%> of his meat

וּבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter כֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> If the priest's כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> If תִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> he זָ֑ר <S%H2114><s%> to a layman הִ֕וא <S%H1931><s%> he בִּתְרוּמַ֥ת <S%H8641><s%> of an offering הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6944><s%> of the holy things לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> she may not eat

וּבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter כֹּהֵן֩ <S%H3548><s%> But if the priest's כִּ֨י <S%H3588><s%> if תִהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> becomes אַלְמָנָ֣ה <S%H490><s%> be a widow וּגְרוּשָׁ֗ה <S%H1644><s%> or divorced וְזֶרַע֮ <S%H2233><s%> and have no child אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and has לָהּ֒ וְשָׁבָ֞ה <S%H7725><s%> and is returned אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1><s%> unto her father's כִּנְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <S%H5271><s%> as in her youth מִלֶּ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> meat אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> of her father's תֹּאכֵ֑ל <S%H398><s%> she shall eat וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner זָ֖ר <S%H2114><s%> but there shall no stranger לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֹ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> eat בּֽוֹ׃ ס

וְאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if a man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> if יֹאכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> eat קֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [of] the holy thing בִּשְׁגָגָ֑ה <S%H7684><s%> unwittingly וְיָסַ֤ף <S%H3254><s%> then he shall put חֲמִֽשִׁיתוֹ֙ <S%H2549><s%> the fifth עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> of וְנָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> [part] thereof unto it and shall give לַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> [it] unto the priest אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> with the holy thing

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יְחַלְּל֔וּ <S%H2490><s%> And they shall not profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָדְשֵׁ֖י <S%H6944><s%> the holy things בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יָרִ֖ימוּ <S%H7311><s%> which they offer לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְהִשִּׂ֤יאוּ <S%H5375><s%> Or suffer them to bear אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> the iniquity אַשְׁמָ֔ה <S%H819><s%> of trespass בְּאָכְלָ֖ם <S%H398><s%> when they eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָדְשֵׁיהֶ֑ם <S%H6944><s%> their holy things כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> for I the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <S%H6942><s%> do sanctify פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בָּנָ֗יו <S%H1121><s%> and to his sons וְאֶל֙ <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto them Whatsoever אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> man מִבֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> [he be] of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> or הַגֵּ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> or of the strangers בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יַקְרִ֤יב <S%H7126><s%> that will offer קָרְבָּנוֹ֙ <S%H7133><s%> his oblation לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> is any נִדְרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5088><s%> for all his vows וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any נִדְבוֹתָ֔ם <S%H5071><s%> and for all his freewill offerings אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יַקְרִ֥יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> which they will offer לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering

לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֑ם <S%H7522><s%> [Ye shall offer] at your own will תָּמִ֣ים <S%H8549><s%> without blemish זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> a male בַּבָּקָ֕ר <S%H1241><s%> of the beeves בַּכְּשָׂבִ֖ים <S%H3775><s%> of the sheep וּבָֽעִזִּֽים׃ <S%H5795><s%> or of the goats

כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after בּ֥וֹ מ֖וּם <S%H3971><s%> [But] whatsoever hath a blemish לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַקְרִ֑יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> [that] shall ye not offer כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not לְרָצ֖וֹן <S%H7522><s%> for it shall not be acceptable יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶֽם׃

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And whosoever כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יַקְרִ֤יב <S%H7126><s%> offereth זֶֽבַח־ <S%H2077><s%> a sacrifice שְׁלָמִים֙ <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> God לְפַלֵּא־ <S%H6381><s%> to accomplish נֶ֙דֶר֙ <S%H5088><s%> [his] vow א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לִנְדָבָ֔ה <S%H5071><s%> or a freewill offering בַּבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> in beeves א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> or sheep תָּמִ֤ים <S%H8549><s%> it shall be perfect יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become לְרָצ֔וֹן <S%H7522><s%> to be accepted כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> shall be no מ֖וּם <S%H3971><s%> there shall be no blemish לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become בּֽוֹ׃

עַוֶּרֶת֩ <S%H5788><s%> Blind א֨וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שָׁב֜וּר <S%H7665><s%> or broken אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or חָר֣וּץ <S%H2782><s%> or maimed אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or יַבֶּ֗לֶת <S%H2990><s%> or having a wen א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or גָרָב֙ <S%H1618><s%> or scurvy א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or יַלֶּ֔פֶת <S%H3217><s%> or scabbed לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַקְרִ֥יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> ye shall not offer אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> another לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> these unto the LORD וְאִשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H801><s%> an offering by fire לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> nor make מֵהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> of them upon the altar לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְשׁ֥וֹר <S%H7794><s%> Either a bullock וָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H7716><s%> or a lamb שָׂר֣וּעַ <S%H8311><s%> that hath any thing superfluous וְקָל֑וּט <S%H7038><s%> or lacking in his parts נְדָבָה֙ <S%H5071><s%> [for] a freewill offering תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> that mayest thou offer אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וּלְנֵ֖דֶר <S%H5088><s%> but for a vow לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵרָצֶֽה׃ <S%H7521><s%> it shall not be accepted

וּמָע֤וּךְ <S%H4600><s%> that which is bruised וְכָתוּת֙ <S%H3807><s%> or crushed וְנָת֣וּק <S%H5423><s%> or broken וְכָר֔וּת <S%H3772><s%> or cut לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַקְרִ֖יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> Ye shall not offer לַֽיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וּֽבְאַרְצְכֶ֖ם <S%H776><s%> [any offering thereof] in your land לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> neither shall ye make

וּמִיַּ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> the hand בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted נֵכָ֗ר <S%H5236><s%> Neither from a stranger's לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַקְרִ֛יבוּ <S%H7126><s%> shall ye offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> the bread אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> of your God מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> such כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מָשְׁחָתָ֤ם <S%H4893><s%> of any of these because their corruption בָּהֶם֙ מ֣וּם <S%H3971><s%> [is] in them [and] blemishes בָּ֔ם לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יֵרָצ֖וּ <S%H7521><s%> [be] in them they shall not be accepted לָכֶֽם׃ פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

שׁ֣וֹר <S%H7794><s%> When a bullock אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or כֶ֤שֶׂב <S%H3775><s%> or a sheep אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or עֵז֙ <S%H5795><s%> or a goat כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When יִוָּלֵ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> is brought forth וְהָיָ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> shall remain שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> then it shall be seven יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> under the dam וּמִיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁמִינִי֙ <S%H8066><s%> and from the eighth וָהָ֔לְאָה <S%H1973><s%> and thenceforth יֵרָצֶ֕ה <S%H7521><s%> it shall be accepted לְקָרְבַּ֥ן <S%H7133><s%> for an offering אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

וְשׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> And [whether it be] cow אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שֶׂ֑ה <S%H7716><s%> or ewe אֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> it and her young לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשְׁחֲט֖וּ <S%H7819><s%> ye shall not kill בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> both in one

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תִזְבְּח֥וּ <S%H2076><s%> And when ye will offer זֶֽבַח־ <S%H2077><s%> a sacrifice תּוֹדָ֖ה <S%H8426><s%> of thanksgiving לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֖ם <S%H7522><s%> [it] at your own will תִּזְבָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H2076><s%> offer

בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> On the same day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> the same יֵאָכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> it shall be eaten up לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> none תוֹתִ֥ירוּ <S%H3498><s%> ye shall leave מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> of it עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> none of it until the morrow אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H8104><s%> Therefore shall ye keep מִצְוֹתַ֔י <S%H4687><s%> my commandments וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> them I [am] the LORD

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תְחַלְּלוּ֙ <S%H2490><s%> Neither shall ye profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name קָדְשִׁ֔י <S%H6944><s%> my holy וְנִ֨קְדַּשְׁתִּ֔י <S%H6942><s%> but I will be hallowed בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD מְקַדִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H6942><s%> which hallow

הַמּוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> That brought you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> to be your God אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD פ
